Title: The Return of Martin Guerre
Genre: Biography, Crime, Drama, History, Mystery, Romance
Writer: Jean-Claude Carrière, Janet Lewis (novel), Daniel Vigne, Natalie Zemon Davis
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Nathalie Baye, Maurice Barrier, Bernard-Pierre Donnadieu
Plot: In medieval France, some villagers challenge a man's claim of identity when he (as he says) returns home from some time in the army.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 3 nominations.
